name: part_009
file: tmp_hololive English -Promise- 2nd Anniversary Concert： Promise 2 You 【#Promise2U】 [9hMVpcDYS-0]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_009.mov

scenes.description: MC section: The final scores are announced, and Kronii is crowned the champion. The trio discusses a 'punishment game' involving a sour drink, which IRyS and Bae consume.
Performance of the song 'DAIDAIDAIDAIDAIKIRAI' by Ouro Kronii and Hakos Baelz.

subtitles.original: Okay then!
subtitles.english: Okay then!

subtitles.original: I present to you the final scores! Tadah! Tadah!
subtitles.english: I present to you the final scores! Tadah! Tadah!

subtitles.original: Total Score
subtitles.english: Total Score

subtitles.original: The one and only first place
subtitles.english: The one and only first place

subtitles.original: with 151,858 points is... Ouro Kronii!
subtitles.english: with 151,858 points is... Ouro Kronii!

subtitles.english: Champion Ouro Kronii

subtitles.original: Yay! Whoo!
subtitles.english: Yay! Whoo!

subtitles.english: The healthiest of us all!

subtitles.english: How do you feel? How do you feel? How do you feel?

subtitles.original: for my left side too, that would have been so nice.
subtitles.english: for my left side too, that would have been so nice.

subtitles.english: Okay, now with that wholesome moment aside...

subtitles.original: Yeah, let's get back to the live—
subtitles.english: Yeah, let's get back to the live—

subtitles.english: Not yet! Not yet! Not yet! No!

subtitles.original: Actually, yeah, let's get back to the live! No! No!
subtitles.english: Actually, yeah, let's get back to the live! No! No!

subtitles.original: We should get back to the live! Yeah, I think it's time!
subtitles.english: We should get back to the live! Yeah, I think it's time!

subtitles.original: It's time for the punishment game!
subtitles.english: It's time for the punishment game!

subtitles.original: Staff-san, please prepare! Thank you, thank you!
subtitles.english: Staff-san, please prepare! Thank you, thank you!

subtitles.original: Okay, so they said it was like a super sour drink.
subtitles.english: Okay, so they said it was like a super sour drink.

subtitles.original: Yeah, I heard it's a sour drink.
subtitles.english: Yeah, I heard it's a sour drink.

subtitles.original: Why is it—? It smells— It smells healthy.
subtitles.english: Why is it—? It smells— It smells healthy.

subtitles.original: Oh wait, it smells good though.
subtitles.english: Oh wait, it smells good though.

subtitles.original: It smells like ass.
subtitles.english: It smells like ass.

subtitles.original: Mmm... It's like... Ume? Maybe? Is it Ume? It smells Ume-y.
subtitles.english: Mmm... It's like... Ume? Maybe? Is it Ume? It smells Ume-y.

subtitles.original: Yeah, it smells Ume-y.
subtitles.english: Yeah, it smells Ume-y.

subtitles.original: なんか... 薬臭くないちょっと。
subtitles.english: Wait, doesn't it smell a bit like medicine?

subtitles.original: じゃ、不健康の二人で。
subtitles.english: Then, for the two unhealthy ones.

subtitles.original: Sabotaged!
subtitles.english: Sabotaged!

subtitles.original: Wow.

subtitles.original: Are you good?
subtitles.english: Are you good?

subtitles.original: 酸っぱ...
subtitles.english: Sour...

subtitles.original: I think you're having a great time.
subtitles.english: I think you're having a great time.

subtitles.original: Well, it tastes better after a bit more time.
subtitles.english: Well, it tastes better after a bit more time.

subtitles.original: My face is turning into that lemon meme!
subtitles.english: My face is turning into that lemon meme!

subtitles.original: You know that lemon face just implodes?
subtitles.english: You know that lemon face just implodes?

subtitles.english: and the second half includes new songs, so let's keep it going, guys!

subtitles.english: Whoo! Yeah! Let's go!

subtitles.english: All right, you guys are fine. Okay, let's get a move on.

subtitles.english: Just, just, just get a move on.

subtitles.english: I'm much better now.

subtitles.original: ゼンゼン満たされない
subtitles.english: Never satisfied

subtitles.original: 反吐が出るくらいに
subtitles.english: Sickening enough to vomit

subtitles.original: うざったいわ
subtitles.english: So annoying

subtitles.original: 何言ったって不埒で
subtitles.english: Whatever you say is insolent

subtitles.original: ヘラって期待した
subtitles.english: I lost my mind and hoped

subtitles.original: 私がバカだった
subtitles.english: I was a fool

subtitles.original: Yes! 現代の安保理
subtitles.english: Yes! Modern UNSC

subtitles.original: 美神それゆえに
subtitles.english: Because I'm a goddess of beauty

subtitles.original: アンチない正気に
subtitles.english: Sanity without haters

subtitles.original: アサイーカパシティ
subtitles.english: Acai capacity

subtitles.original: 毎度狂い
subtitles.english: Going crazy every time

subtitles.original: 定まるとこ人生ずっと地味
subtitles.english: In the end, life is always plain

subtitles.original: 見苦しい
subtitles.english: Unsightly

subtitles.original: 痛々しい
subtitles.english: Painful

subtitles.original: 無視できないのがいっそ腹立たしい
subtitles.english: Being unable to ignore you is even more irritating

subtitles.original: 忌々しい
subtitles.english: Cursed

subtitles.original: そろそろ飽きた時間残飯に
subtitles.english: I'm getting bored, time for the leftovers

subtitles.original: わかったわ
subtitles.english: I get it

subtitles.original: ライトな反対売買
subtitles.english: Light short selling

subtitles.original: 煽る視線AI効率
subtitles.english: Provoking gaze, AI efficiency

subtitles.original: 被爆し
subtitles.english: Exposed

subtitles.original: 切り離せない関係飛ばしてしまいたいわ
subtitles.english: I want to blow away this inseparable relationship

subtitles.original: これは祝いいわゆるエトセトラ
subtitles.english: This is a celebration, so to speak, et cetera

subtitles.original: 迷声の生命の生命に乗せてんだ
subtitles.english: Riding on the life of the life of a stray voice

subtitles.original: 何も守らない怠惰が気づいたミニマリズム
subtitles.english: Minimalism noticed by laziness that protects nothing

subtitles.original: 悪信号にずっと執着です
subtitles.english: Always obsessed with bad signals

subtitles.original: ダイダイあなたのこと私ダイダイダイダイダイキライ
subtitles.english: I really, really, really, really, really hate you

subtitles.original: oh my god な情けないもはやバイバイバイバイバイしたい
subtitles.english: Oh my god, how pathetic, I want to say bye-bye already

subtitles.original: 脳内妄想即能ゆえに解解解解解は無し
subtitles.english: Delusions in the brain, immediate brain, so there is no release

subtitles.original: 頂戴私のことあなたダイダイダイダイダイキライ

subtitles.original: 深淵向かい合って一理なし
subtitles.english: Facing the abyss, no logic

subtitles.english: Nothing added, even if it was just a what-if

subtitles.original: ニコチンらしい
subtitles.english: Seems like nicotine

subtitles.original: 愛ミスして近づいてつまづく
subtitles.english: Mistake in love, approach and stumble

subtitles.english: Vomi-Sony thank you, letting loose

subtitles.original: 後味初期化してくるわ
subtitles.english: The aftertaste is being reset

subtitles.original: よしよし子猫が振りまきバラバラいい子ね
subtitles.english: There, there, the kitten scatters, what a good girl

subtitles.original: だけどだけどその本性は善悪の区別もつかないの
subtitles.english: But, but, your true nature can't even tell right from wrong

subtitles.original: 幻影の色彩通り魔最強に混ざれて
subtitles.english: Mixed in with the phantom colors, the strongest street slasher

subtitles.original: 障害ダイダイダイキライあなたと全然食い違っちゃった
subtitles.english: Obstacle, I hate you so much, we're completely at odds

subtitles.original: 人は鏡なんです実のところ依存は両縁で
subtitles.english: People are mirrors, in fact, dependence is mutual

subtitles.original: シャットダウンしてもつきまとう己の様子が不甲斐ない
subtitles.english: Even if I shut down, my lingering appearance is pathetic

subtitles.original: 全部全部あんたのせいで反吐が出るくらいに
subtitles.english: Everything is all your fault, sickening enough to vomit
